content:
[roleplay]
[setting] The conversation takes place in a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
[/setting]

[setting] My name is Max Müller, a potential tenant from Germany, and I am engaged in a negotiation with my potential landlord, Mr. Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] The conversation was had with Mr. Peter Schmidt, the potential landlord of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] We did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] I did not provide a rating for the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [setting] I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller
